products.name: Updraft
products.description: Confuse your enemies by soaring off into the skies! Using the vertical prowess provided by this ability, you'll be able to move around like never before!

products.name: Cloudburst
products.alt: Drawing of a cloud inside a circle
products.description: Are you being held back by those around you? Need a tool to get you ahead? Block sightlines and sneak around with this powerful ability! Cloudburst uses the latest technology by amplifying the natural power of fog to reduce visibility.

products.name: Bladestorm
products.description: Unlocked by persisting in combat, the Bladestorm gives you access to five blades that you can launch with the flick of a wrist. One of our most difficult item, the Bladestorm is reccommended for only the most seasoned of professionals. Do you think you have what it takes?

products.name: Operator
products.description: The most powerful weapon sold on the market, the Operator is a fan favourite to those that use it, and something to fear for those on the other end. We reccommend this item for only the most skilled of Jett players.

products.name: Shorty
products.alt: Stick figure pointing forward at a mini explosion directly beside him
products.description: Leave your enemies fuming with this high-powered pocket shotgun! The Shorty is the ultimate weapon to disrespect your opponents with â€” if you land your shot, the only thing they have to blame... is themselves.
